posts.title: Pirate Peg Leg Corkscrew
posts.content: Yaarrrr, now with the pirate peg leg corkscrew you’ll be able to pop open your favorite wines or eighteenth century rum bottles like a pro. This miniature pirate is always willing to lend a hand – or in this case his corkscrew peg leg – to facilitate your inebriation.

posts.title: LEGO Mars Curiosity Rover
posts.content: Let your imagination soar by taking imaginary missions to the red rock using the LEGO Mars curiosity rover. This intricate piece offers quite a challenge with over 295 pieces, including an articulated robotic arm and 6-wheel suspension custom made for the rough Martian terrain.

posts.title: Man And Sea Book
posts.content: Embark on an eye opening journey through our world’s vast oceans within the pages of the Man and Sea book. This compelling book takes you on a tour of the seven seas through page after page of visually stunning aerial and underwater photographs.

posts.title: Mustache Tie Clip
posts.content: I mustache you a question, who said tie clips need to be a boring clothing accessory? Now you can compliment your bold facial hair with a mustache tie clip. Available in gunmetal and silver, there’s no better way to boost your manliness than with this mustache tie clip.

posts.title: Crude Oil Shower Gel
posts.content: Throw out those wimpy incense sticks and mood setting candles – you’re a beer drinking, testosterone oozing man and you should shower like one with the crude oil shower gel. It’s made from the same stuff that destroys the environment and kills off weak marine life.

posts.title: Mini R2-D2 Lights
posts.content: Have your room glowing with the force or even decorate your Christmas tree in geeky fashion with this set of mini R2-D2 lights. Included in this set are ten mini R2-D2 lights that will go perfectly with any Star Wars fan’s memorabilia collection.

posts.title: Zipper Bookmark
posts.content: Save your place in an eye-catching way with one of these zipper bookmarks. Available in either orange, green, or blue, they work with any book and create the illusion that the top of your book has been sealed shut by a colorful plastic zipper.

posts.title: Grenade Soap
posts.content: Set off an explosion of freshness during your next shower by washing yourself with this grenade soap. This life size 6 ounce soap is made with nurturing ingredients like shea butter and coconut oil and features a delightfully crisp scent reminiscent of fresh morning dew.

posts.title: Zombie Sleeping Mask
posts.content: Enjoy some peace and quiet while you rest by keeping others away from you with the zombie sleeping mask. This one size fits all mask features a terrifying graphic that makes you look like a brain hungry undead zombie while you sleep.

posts.title: Versatile String Light System
posts.content: Light up practically any type of environment safely and easily using this versatile string light system. This USB powered lighting system glows 10-20 times brighter than average Christmas string lights, and can be mounted to virtually anything you can find.

posts.title: The Bartender’s Cocktail Book
posts.content: Learn how to become a masterful barman from the comfort of home with the help of The Bartender’s Cocktail book. The book shows thirsty individuals how to skillfully prepare all PDT’s  300+ signature cocktails such as the bacon infused bourbon.

posts.title: Ultimate Portable Tailgate Cooler
posts.content: Redefine the way you spend your days tailgating before the big game with the ultimate portable tailgate cooler. With features like a special cooler compartment and space for all your grilling tools, this incredible cooler includes everything you need for a day at the game.
